document_data.mainbody:
Hunters daggers were sadistic enchanted daggers from the Western Heartlands in the late 15 century DR.
Apart from a simple +1 enchantment to their aim and damage, hunters daggers left their targets ripped open and bleeding with each hit.
*Roah Moonglow, a halfling merchant and a Zhentarim representative who did business with the Cult of the Absolute in the .
